mapper.insert: insert into board(num, writer, email, subject, passwd, regdate, readcount, ref, restep, relevel, content, ip) values(board_seq.nextval,#{writer},#{email},#{subject},#{passwd},#{regdate},#{readcount},board_seq.nextval,#{restep},#{relevel},#{content},#{ip})
mapper.update: update board set readcount = readcount+1 where num=#{num}
